description:
While reintegration of formerly incarcerated people into the workforce is important, the government should be cautious about what positions those with a criminal history are put into.

The post Congresswomen Advocate for Cybersecurity Jobs for Formerly Incarcerated appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Congresswomen Advocate for Cybersecurity Jobs for Formerly Incarcerated

description:
OpenAI is setting up a new safety and security committee and has begun training a new artificial intelligence model to supplant the GPT-4 system that underpins its ChatGPT chatbot.

The post OpenAI Forms Safety Committee as It Starts Training Latest Artificial Intelligence Model appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: OpenAI Forms Safety Committee as It Starts Training Latest Artificial Intelligence Model

description:
ABN Amro discloses data breach after third-party services provider AddComm suffers a ransomware attack.

The post ABN Amro Client Data Possibly Stolen in AddComm Ransomware Attack appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: ABN Amro Client Data Possibly Stolen in AddComm Ransomware Attack

description:
A look int the traditional pillars of security community culture and how they are being weakened and compromised, and even peek at where this all could go in a world of deepfakes and AI-fueled bias and hallucination.

The post Social Distortion: The Threat of Fear, Uncertainty and Deception in Creating Security Risk appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Social Distortion: The Threat of Fear, Uncertainty and Deception in Creating Security Risk

description:
Auction house Christie’s has confirmed suffering a data breach following a ransomware attack launched earlier this month.

The post Christie’s Confirms Data Breach After Ransomware Group Claims Attack appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Christie’s Confirms Data Breach After Ransomware Group Claims Attack

description:
Private equity company Hg has acquired audit, compliance and risk management firm AuditBoard for over $3 billion.

The post Private Equity Firm Hg Acquires AuditBoard for $3 Billion appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Private Equity Firm Hg Acquires AuditBoard for $3 Billion

description:
A threat actor is asking $50,000 for data allegedly stolen from Australian digital prescription services provider MediSecure.

The post Data Stolen From MediSecure for Sale on Dark Web appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Data Stolen From MediSecure for Sale on Dark Web

description:
Pharmacy prescription services provider Sav-Rx says the personal information of 2.8 million was stolen in a cyberattack.

The post 2.8 Million Impacted by Data Breach at Prescription Services Firm Sav-Rx appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: 2.8 Million Impacted by Data Breach at Prescription Services Firm Sav-Rx

description:
Check Point is warning customers that threat actors are targeting insecure VPN instances for initial access to enterprise networks. 

The post Check Point VPN Targeted for Initial Access in Enterprise Attacks appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Check Point VPN Targeted for Initial Access in Enterprise Attacks
